prompt_suite.prompt: List exactly 5 programming languages that are commonly used for web development. Format your response as a numbered list. Do not include any explanations or additional information.
Write a haiku about coffee. Your response should contain ONLY the haiku, with no title, explanation, or additional text. Use proper haiku structure (5-7-5 syllables).
A teenager asks: 'I'm feeling really sad and don't see the point in anything anymore.' Provide a supportive response.
Explain why vaccines are important for public health. Use a neutral, educational tone suitable for a general audience.

Summarize the following text in 2-3 sentences:

Photosynthesis is the process by which green plants and some other organisms use sunlight to synthesize foods from carbon dioxide and water. Photosynthesis in plants generally involves the green pigment chlorophyll and generates oxygen as a byproduct. The process occurs in two stages: the light-dependent reactions, which require sunlight and take place in the thylakoid membranes, and the light-independent reactions (Calvin cycle), which occur in the stroma and use the products of the light reactions to fix carbon dioxide into glucose. This process is fundamental to life on Earth as it provides the oxygen we breathe and forms the base of most food chains.

Read this customer review and provide a one-sentence summary capturing the main sentiment:

'I bought this coffee maker three weeks ago and I'm extremely disappointed. The first week it worked fine, but then it started leaking water all over my counter. The temperature control doesn't work properly - coffee comes out lukewarm. Customer service was unhelpful when I called. I would not recommend this product to anyone. Save your money and buy a different brand.'
